limitedAccessDesc: Free users can have a maximum of {{noOfServices}} services.
noCloudSaveDesc: Data is not saved in the cloud.
noAdvancedStatsDesc: Advanced statistics are locked for free users.
basicSupportDesc: Only basic support is available via email or FAQ.
unlimitedServicesDesc: Paid user have access to unlimited services.
adFreeExperienceDesc: Enjoy an ad-free experience as a paid user.
cloudSyncDesc: Data is saved in the cloud for easy access across devices.
prioritySupportDesc: Priority customer support with faster response times.
donationDesc: Support the development of the app with a donation.
someSubscriptions: We've discovered some subscriptions on the cloud, we've added them to your account!
subscriptionReminderDesc: Receive a reminder 3 days before your subscription is charged.
dailyUsageDesc: Receive a daily notification (At 12 PM) based on how much you've paid today.
weeklyUsageDesc: Receive a weekly notification (Sunday at 12 PM) based on how much you've paid this week.
otherNotificationsDesc: Other notifications such as new features, updates, and promotions.
pleaseProvideNameForSubscription: Please provide a name for the subscription!
areYouSureYouWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete: {{name}}?
deleteingCurrentItem: Deleting {{name}} will remove all associated items. This action cannot be undone.
howToAddSubscription: How do I add a new subscription?
howToAddSubscriptionDetails: You can add a new subscription by navigating to the 'Add Subscription' section from the main menu. Fill in the service name, the amount you pay, the billing cycle (weekly, monthly, etc.), and any other relevant details, then click 'Save.'
howToEditOrDeleteSubscription: How can I edit or delete a subscription?
howToEditOrDeleteSubscriptionDetails: Go to the subscription list, find the subscription you want to modify, and click on the edit icon. To delete, simply press the delete button next to the subscription.
viewMonthlySpending: How can I view my total monthly spending?
viewMonthlySpendingDetails: On the statistics page, you’ll see an overview of your subscriptions and the total amount you’re paying each month.
contactDeveloper: How do I contact the developer?
contactDeveloperDetails: If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to contact us through the 'Contact' section in the app settings or email us at [{{email}}].
sendErrorLogs: How can I send error logs?
sendErrorLogsDetails: If you encounter any issues or bugs, you can enable the 'Debug' mode in the settings menu by pressing your name 5 times. This will enable the Export Debug button at the end of the settings screen and will allow you to send error logs directly to the developer for troubleshooting.
exportSubscriptionData: Can I export my subscription data?
exportSubscriptionDataDetails: At this time, we don't support direct export, but we are working on adding this feature in a future update.
resetOrClearData: How do I reset or clear all my subscription data?
resetOrClearDataDetails: In the settings menu, there’s an option to reset your subscription list. Use this with caution, as it will permanently delete all your data.
exportDesc: Save your current data to a file on your device for backup or sharing.
errorImportData: Could not import data. Invalid file format or data is corrupted.
undexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
importDesc: Load data from a file to update or restore. Errors will occur if the file format is incorrect.
importDescWarn: Danger: Importing data will overwrite your current local data, will update it on the cloud (Only for premium) and a new import will be available again in 2 days from now.
deleteDataDesc: Permanently remove all your saved data from the app. Make sure to export your data first, as this action cannot be undone.
deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. Please export your data before proceeding, as this action is irreversible.
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteYourDataDesc: This will delete all of your data from both local storage and the cloud. This action cannot be undone.
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteYourAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteYourAccountDesc: Deleting your account will remove all personal data and settings. This action cannot be undone.
unlockPremiumStatistics: Unlock premium features and insights just for you!
